attributes.action: Bring Copyright and Sales of Good act to the modern era
attributes.additional_details: Despite the internet becoming a core part of our lives our current copyright and Sales of goods acts are still stuck in the 80s, many grey areas have appeared that officals complain about, if the Goverment wants to give us our rights on the internet they need to bring the Copyright and Sales of Goods acts out of the 80s and into the 2000's, it needs to reflect on the modern world because as it currently stands we are using horridly outdated legal papers
